website_summaries.verdict: While it is certainly much cheaper than most digital smart scales and offers a wide range of body measurements, we find it difficult to recommend a scale with an app that describes a person 1% above healthy as "chubby". For that reason, we'd keep this away from children and anyone at risk of unhealthy body-perception issues. For adults who want an inexpensive set of digital scales, the Hamswan Bluetooth Smart Scale offers great value and a decent design - although its accuracy has been questioned.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price, a bit inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, the app connects well most of the time. Wouldn't rely on the fat/muscle readings, as they can vary wildly, by 2% day to day. Software has some bugs, like scrolling scale for timeline, photos sideways, etc. BMI 22+ is called 'chubby', which is a bit controversial. Weight reading seems to be pretty accurate, 200g variation.
customer_reviews.author: Vilija

customer_reviews.title: Accurate scales with many many details about body.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking body scales, dark tempered glass looks very decent. There are two options KG or Lbs. Scales are battery powered , 3 aaa, batteries not included. Healthu+ app can be downloaded for play store. Its easy to connect app to scales just follow guide. App itself is similar easy to use. There so many details it shows about body. Body fat, body muscle, bone mass, bmi, and more some of them i see first time. It very interesting to check your progress or regress:D
customer_reviews.author: aur

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, app downloaded by scanning the QR code on the box, open it put in a few details like name, age and height and step on the scales, one quick check to make sure your phone is seeing the same as displays on the scales and all done, data transferred straight into Apple Health, can't get the data into Garmin Connect but that is just Garmin being a pain as the want to sell you their own scales!
customer_reviews.author: D. K. Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Modern and stylish scale
customer_reviews.text: The scales came nicely packaged and the instruction manual inside was handy. I was able to set the scale up in minutes. They have a modern and stylish design which I like as they can be placed almost anywhere and will still look nice. The digital display was fairly accurate as long as you stay place your feet on the four electrons. The scale connects really easily via Bluetooth on the app and it allows me to check a variety of things which is useful and informative. Make sure you have 3x aaa batteries as they are not included. Overall I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sheb

customer_reviews.title: Value for money easy to use and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and arrived on time, so far so good not used much as brought in advance whilst bathroom being decorated. Tethered to phone straight away and picked up again couple of weeks later via the app - after inactivity. Not sure how accurate the info is but I’m happy to use as a rough guide for health reasons more than worrying about weight management
customer_reviews.author: Julie McCann

customer_reviews.title: App is not so good, the rest is actually fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I am hunting for a cheap version of something expensive I really expect to be let down, and so I am really pleased with this. Cheaper it may be but you are not sacrificing anything for that apart from a swanky app. The app really is rubbish so I am hoping maybe they will update it and possibly add stones and lbs for me. Tells you BMI, Water Weight, Fat Mass, Bones etc etc looks absolutely fantabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs A Allingham

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: The scales came very quickly and do everything the manufacturer claims. I was a bit shocked how devastatingly accurate the scales and app are, but they provide an excellent motivator to lose weight. The scales are easy to connect to a smartphone and take about five seconds to transmit your data to your phone. The app enables you to record lots of data about your body as well as the basic weight and produces the information as a graph or a chronological list. It is early days yet but I think these are terrific value for money. It will be interesting to see how long they continue to work.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good scales with app
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy scales which you don't have to bash to start up, got confused on how to connect to app but basically need bluetooth on & press scale icon before stepping on scale then weight loads onto app, the various functions in app for example bmi, bmr body fat bone density etc are useful as a guide but not entirely sure of accuracy but it is only a guide & is a useful aspect in the fight for a healthy body! All in all these scales are great value for money & a great weight loss tool
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Heath

customer_reviews.title: Really cool !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed by this product quality/price ratio. It is cheaper , smart tech included and has a cool design. Unfortunately batteries are not included but with few pounds more you can simply use a charger avoiding recycling batteries. Well done. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola Rosano

customer_reviews.title: Excellent to keep track of BMI
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this body fat analyser everyday. To take a reading, stand on the scales and then press the measure button on the app. It gives me so much information in a reading. And then I can track my progress on the graph. Really pleased with the build quality and the performance.
customer_reviews.author: BAKSMPK

customer_reviews.title: Good for weighing, questionable analysis of fat, muscle etc.
customer_reviews.text: Very compact and light. The app you use with it is intuitive and clear. The weight measurements seem accurate, but the breakdown of body fat, muscle mass, body water content etc. within the app seems a bit arbitrary. One day it will say you lost 0.4kg muscle since the previous day... Doesn't seem likely! Otherwise nice to use for monitoring weight. The baby mode is a bit slow.
customer_reviews.author: Eiszaun

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working a few months in. Wouldn't turn on at all. Initially I thought it was out of battery. But it still doesn't work even when I replaced the batteries. Contacted seller a few weeks ago for a repair or replacement, since the description says there's a 360 day warranty. But haven't heard back from them yet.
customer_reviews.author: CXW

customer_reviews.title: Weighs you in at a KG more than the second and third time?!
customer_reviews.text: I have to weigh myself three times to make sure that it is registering a correct weight. The first time you stand on it, it weighs you in at a KG heavier than the second and third time? Useful app that comes with it but will never understand how it distinguishes the difference in muscle mass, body fat, body water, visceral fat, bone mass, protein, fat level, body type, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: AVOID - Faulty and unhelpful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for a friend, it arrived and isn’t accurate at all, the app multiplies everything by TEN! And doesn’t show half of the percentages it should. Eg, my weight is 50kg, the app shows this as 5000kg and that my body fat percentage is in the 5000s, water and bone mass is 0%. I contacted the seller 3 days after the parcel was delivered and haven’t heard anything back. I’d like to hear back from them ASAP with a resolution to this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Beth J

customer_reviews.title: Definitely value for money
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant for the money. I had a pair of Withings scales which suddenly stopped working and didn't want to pay that amount of money again. These do the job perfectly and help you keep track. One thing I have found is that I have to have the app open on my phone and have the phone very near while standing on the scales but overall I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality with super features weighing machine
customer_reviews.text: Was looking since long for a weighing machine. Got this as first one in my home and I should say this is really awesome and easy enough to be used by anybody. Multiple parameters measuring capability of this super machine makes it A PERFECT WEIGHING MACHINE. I can keep on monitoring all parameters on daily basis very easily through it.Love to have it.
customer_reviews.author: JYOTI PALIWAL

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant value, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use via the app, alerts you if the reading seems inaccurate and an easy way to keep an eye on your weight. I like the option for more than one profile on the app. Overall a great set of scales for the price
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good product. the scale is made from good material and it only uses 3 AAA batteries which is very convenient. Although i can not confirm whether or not the scale is accurate, i can say that is seems correct. Was an Excellent Purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Abubakar98k

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and works well!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, easy to use, easy to connect with app and helps me keep track of my weight and health! Amazing value for money, clean sleek design definitely looks like it cost more than it did!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Avoid pre-owned sold as new doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Came already paired with linked indicator constant. Yuck it's been used by someone else but this was sold as new!!! Will not pair. Used stated app, turned on location permission and followed prompt on app. Will not disconnect from previous owners phone.
customer_reviews.author: N. Briscombe

customer_reviews.title: Body fat scale
customer_reviews.text: Excellent very accurate scale. Good item for people who want to be fit and control weight. Nice design and fast cooperate with easy app. Really happy with a purchase. Recommend for family and friends... Happy 😊
customer_reviews.author: Liah

customer_reviews.title: Faulty app/scale?
customer_reviews.text: Nice design easy to use and download the app but when I used the scales it gave me some rather odd results. I’m 176lb and it said I was 180lb and ‘obesity 1’ category for fat level which was quite startling. I’m quite lean and always been a slim build. It then went on to say my BMI was 33! Which is really bad. Clearly there’s a product or app fault.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Continually Inaccurate readings
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these scales were giving inaccurate readings continually. 3 consecutively different readings in few minutes. Tried for over a month and compared with regular manual scales and nope..... always well off! Don’t waste money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and accurate
customer_reviews.text: I brought these to track my weight loss journey with my personal trainer. They work really well and sync with my google fit account so its easy to keep track of my progress. The quality of the scales are really good
customer_reviews.author: Garry Spight

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It works fine, but has an horrible android app ant it is a battery eater (3x AAA)
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, modern and full of hidden technology
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek and modern looking scales that feel sturdy and well made. The hidden technology is a bonus and because it’s hidden it doesn’t make them futuristic or look out of place in any bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUK User

customer_reviews.title: Great scale
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with the scale. I like that is stylish and it's very fine. It's so light to carry, easy to set up and seems to be performing accurately. The weight registers quickly and stays on screen long enough, I like that it measures so many things: kilograms, body fat, body water, BMI, muscle mass, etc. The app is so easy to use as well. Good buy and delivery fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Binghi

customer_reviews.title: Great set of scales
customer_reviews.text: Love , love , love these . Great set of scales . I use them everyday . Great info as well 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: caroline

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t have any problems. It looks ok and easy to use. The price also ok, basically it worth the price.not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jian Chen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scales
customer_reviews.text: I think these are an excellent set of scales. The information that is provided such as bone weight, visceral fat etc is excellent and allows you to monitor your body other than your actual weight. I have recommended this item to friends
customer_reviews.author: D J Baum

customer_reviews.title: The scale works good
customer_reviews.text: The scale works good. Well made and good design. It has lots of features. I was looking for a new scale to upgrade old one. Happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: SrvtUs

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Terrible - don’t bother. Doesn’t work with new iPhones. It worked with an older iPhone briefly but now doesn’t seems incompatible. No customer service from the company. Emailed them over and over again and no reply. Don’t bother with this brand or item
customer_reviews.author: s k penfold

customer_reviews.title: No problem!
customer_reviews.text: I think it ticks all the boxes, easy to use and install.
customer_reviews.author: Smithy

customer_reviews.title: Great scales - however NO Baby Safe Mode as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great scales, no question. Brought on due to the advertised "Baby Safe Mode" option. Turns out this is NOT an option and scales should NOT be used for children under 10 years of age. Oh dear! Not as advertised! Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great scale. Good app, with synchronisation ing issues.
customer_reviews.text: Over I am satisfied with the product. It doesn't get a full 5 star review because of the application which pose a problem to sync at the beginning. I've used my phone and my wife's several times to get it done. After that it's been happy days!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good and simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy to use Links to phone very easily
customer_reviews.author: Gavin down

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Why spend £50,£100+ this does the job! Gives you accurate readings and the app is very user friendly
customer_reviews.author: Paul Culyer

customer_reviews.title: Problems with Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s great, however now it won’t connect to my Bluetooth and my phone just can’t find it. I’ve tried to turn off both phone and scales and pretty much at a loss of what to do now.
customer_reviews.author: Verity

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately have only lasted just under a year, with me only using it on less than 10 occasions. Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bascombe

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek, good quality for the money, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. M. E. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Easy to link to phone and to use Such a shame that it tells the truth!!
customer_reviews.author: pagan spirit

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great! its design is so simple and cute! also it is so easy to use, measure my body weight, body fat, water, BMI, Muscle mass..all the information I need!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Scales look really trendy and more expensive than they actually are. They were really easy to set up and the app is easy to use too.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Product is really good, easy to set up and arrived earlier than expected It also comes with a warranty just incase Brilliant
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love it, great price, fast delivery, really easy to use
customer_reviews.author: deirdre

customer_reviews.title: A good piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: It has started me on a sensible eating regime because it told me I was chubby!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Nesbitt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scales
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scales for the price! Really impressed! They look fab too
customer_reviews.author: Benny Boy

customer_reviews.title: Great Scales
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, excellent value for money and a good product
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty easy to use once you set up the app, it keeps the record for different people, really useful.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam A.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong information
customer_reviews.text: The measuring is wrong, totally different with the gym weight scale.
customer_reviews.author: Piano

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, thinking of purchasing the kitchen scales next
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Connects to a mobile app - easy to track weight loss progress
customer_reviews.text: The scale connects to a mobile app which makes it easy to track weight loss (or weight gain) progress. There are a lot of sifferent parameters, including body fat percentage tracking. The scale is modern, stylish, and a does the job. If you found my review helpful, please click yes below.
customer_reviews.author: Monica.Ray

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I've had this about 6 weeks and so far the batteries are still going. It's easy to connect to the app and really quick to turn on. There's no need to bang it to turn it on (like my other scales). I would say it's pretty accurate and it looks good too. Would recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst purchases I have ever made. It doesn't measure the weight accurately and you stand on top of it and the weight keeps going up and down so you take ages to get a inaccurare measurement.
customer_reviews.author: LCosta

customer_reviews.title: Detailed information on state of health
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be acute after comparing with my other scalrs. Detailed information given on the app easy to use. Has kick started the whole family into taking better care of our health
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: HAMSWAN Upgraded Bluetooth Body Fat Scale, Smart Wireless BMI Scale Digital Bathroom Weight Scale, Body Composition Analyzer, 180KG/397lbs, Measuring Weight, Body Fat, BMI, Fitness (Black)
